content.html: The government is announcing a new plan today to allow it to ignore the European Court and deport asylum seekers to Rwanda. A new Bill of Rights would adjust the Human Rights Act and allow ministers to overlook injunctions from the European Court of Human Rights.
content.value:
The government is announcing a new plan today to allow it to ignore the European Court and deport asylum seekers to Rwanda.

A new Bill of Rights would adjust the Human Rights Act and allow ministers to overlook injunctions from the European Court of Human Rights.

content.html: It's incredibly worrying that the UK Government wants to bypass a court that was setup to *checks notes* prevent future Nazis from doing Nazi things. If you're cheering this on, just remember - you're a human too. The rights being removed are your rights too.
content.value:
It's incredibly worrying that the UK Government wants to bypass a court that was setup to *checks notes* prevent future Nazis from doing Nazi things.

If you're cheering this on, just remember - you're a human too. The rights being removed are your rights too.
